bibl.title: A Demotic Inscribed Icosahedron from Dakleh Oasis
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Fifth Demotische Sommerschule, Freie Universität Berlin, 27-30 August 2006. - See pp. 144-145: Greek and Roman inscribed icosahedra from Egypt.
MINAS-NERPEL Martina, A Demotic Inscribed Icosahedron from Dakleh Oasis. Avec résumé en anglais.
JEA 93 (2007) pp. 137-148, 13 figg. et pl. coul. IV.
